name: GetProductSpecificationbyProductID
description:
Retrieves information of all specifications of a product by the product's ID.

 ### Response body example

```json
[
    {
        "Id": 227,
        "ProductId": 1,
        "FieldId": 33,
        "FieldValueId": 135,
        "Text": "ValueA"
    },
    {
        "Id": 228,
        "ProductId": 1,
        "FieldId": 34,
        "FieldValueId": 1,
        "Text": "Giant"
    }
]
```

Content-Type.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

$block: Object with the product specification information.

$ul: **Id**: ID of the association of the specification and the product. This ID is used to update or delete the specification.
